meanings.definition: The moment when a rocket or spacecraft leaves the ground.
meanings.sent1: The liftoff of the rocket was a thrilling sight.
meanings.sent2: The liftoff of the spaceship marked the beginning of its journey.
meanings.sent3: The liftoff of the rocket made the spectators cheer with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The liftoff of the spacecraft symbolized human ambition reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The liftoff of the rocket was like a powerful leap into the unknown.

meanings.definition: The act of rising or moving upward from a surface.
meanings.sent1: The liftoff of the hot air balloon was slow and graceful.
meanings.sent2: The liftoff of the airplane was smooth and steady.
meanings.sent3: The liftoff of the kite surprised the children as it soared high.
meanings.sent4: The liftoff of the helicopter felt like floating on a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The liftoff of the paper airplane was swift and unexpected.
